item.title: Valentine Surprise
item.description: Each year, on Valentine’s day, I usually surprise my darling wife with a letter/card, or a bouquet of roses. As it was a yearly thing, I knew she sort of expected these surprises; she’d look surprised, but I knew she wasn’t really.
